data.title: Travel Photographer of the Year 2016: Finalists
data.meta_description: Travel Photographer of the Year announces the photographers from 45 countries that have reached the final phase of judging in the 2016 competition.
data.text:
From many thousands of images entered in this year’s competition, Travel Photographer of the Year announces the photographers from 45 countries that have reached the final phase of judging in the 2016 competition.

The TPOTY 2016 sponsors (of which, Genesis are delighted to be one of) are providing a range of prizes for the awards and the winning photographers will see their work displayed at TPOTY exhibitions – including one at the University of Greenwich in London’s Maritime Greenwich UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The overall winner – the Travel Photographer of the Year 2016 – will be chosen from all entrants who submit at least two portfolios. In addition to receiving the international exposure that comes with winning TPOTY. Entrants submitting two or more portfolios in any of these categories will also automatically be eligible for overall top prize and the title of Travel Photographer of the Year 2016. The winner of the Best Single Image award in each portfolio category receives a Giclée Fine Art exhibition print from Genesis Imaging.

The following photographers have been shortlisted in the 2016 awards:

Upload your files here.
